text: H: Transmitted to Governor.
S: Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 821).
H: Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 888).
H: Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Pierick excused (2).
S: Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none.  0 Excused: none.
S: 48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-30-25
S: Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 222).
H: Forty-eight (48) hours notice Wednesday, 04-30-25.
H: Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 222) as amended in (CD 1).

H: The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Ilagan, Yamashita, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.

S: The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) DeCoite, Wakai, Awa; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Kim.
S: Conference committee meeting to reconvene on 04-25-25 5:46 PM; Conference Room 225.

H: Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Thursday, 04-24-25 10:00AM in conference room 411.

S: Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 755).

H: House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
H: Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No.  690) in amended form (SD 2).
S: Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD  2). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none .  Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none).  Transmitted to House.
S: 48 Hrs. Notice 04-08-25.
S: Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1752) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).

S: The committee(s) on  WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in WAM were as follows: 12 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Moriwaki, Aquino, Elefante, Hashimoto, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Kim, Lee, C., Wakai, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) DeCoite.
S: The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 04-01-25 10:01AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.
S: Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
S: Reported from EDT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1126) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.

S: The committee(s) on  EDT recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in EDT were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) DeCoite, Wakai, Fukunaga, Kim, Awa; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
S: The committee(s) on EDT has scheduled a public hearing on 03-11-25 1:00PM; Conference Room 229 & Videoconference.
S: Referred to EDT, WAM.
S: Passed First Reading.
S: Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 130).
H: Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Pierick, Templo, Ward excused (4).  Transmitted to Senate.
H: Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 987), recommending passage on Third Reading.

H: The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 15 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Takenouchi, Grandinetti, Holt, Hussey, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Kitagawa, Kusch, Lamosao, Lee, M., Miyake, Morikawa, Templo, Alcos, Reyes Oda; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Ward.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Monday, 02-24-25 10:00AM in House conference room 308 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Ward excused (2).
H: Reported from ECD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 329) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

H: The committee on ECD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Ilagan, Hussey, Holt, Tam, Templo, Todd, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.
